1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Order
4  ( ropsOrder,
5    -- * forward
6    consForward, relmapForward,
7    -- * backward
8    consBackward, relmapBackward,
9    -- * lexical
10    consLexical, relmapLexical,
11    -- * order
12    consOrder, relmapOrder, relkitOrder,
13  ) where
14
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base              as B
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax            as S
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data              as D
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core              as C
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base          as Op
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Message  as Msg
21
22
23-- | Pseudorelmap operators for term and tuple ordering.
24ropsOrder :: (Ord c) => [C.Rop c]
25ropsOrder = Op.ropList "order"  -- GROUP
26    --         CONSTRUCTOR        USAGE                      ATTRIBUTE
27    [ Op.def   consBackward       "backward /P ..."          "-term*"
28    , Op.def   consForward        "forward /P ..."           "-term*"
29    , Op.def   consLexical        "lexical"                  ""
30    , Op.def   consOrder          "order /P ..."             "-term*"
31    ]
32
33
34-- ----------------------  forward & backward
35
36consForward :: C.RopCons c
37consForward med =
38  do ns <- Op.getTerms med "-term"
39     Right $ relmapForward med ns
40
41-- | Create @forward@ relmap.
42relmapForward :: C.Intmed c -> [S.TermName] -> C.Relmap c
43relmapForward med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitToward (D.ssRForward, D.ssRForward)
44
45consBackward :: C.RopCons c
46consBackward med =
47  do ns <- Op.getTerms med "-term"
48     Right $ relmapBackward med ns
49
50-- | Create @backward@ relmap.
51relmapBackward :: C.Intmed c -> [S.TermName] -> C.Relmap c
52relmapBackward med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitToward (D.ssRBackward, D.ssRBackward)
53
54-- | Create @forward@ or @backward@ relkit.
55relkitToward :: D.ShareSideMap2 D.NamedType c -> [S.TermName] -> C.RelkitFlow c
56relkitToward _ _ Nothing = Right C.relkitNothing
57relkitToward (heMap, boMap) ns (Just he1)
58    | null unk   = Right kit2
59    | otherwise  = Msg.unkTerm unk he1
60    where
61      lr    = D.shareSide ns he1
62      unk   = D.ssLSide lr ns
63      he2   = D.headMap (heMap lr) he1
64      kit2  = C.relkitJust he2 $ C.RelkitOneToOne False $ boMap lr
65
66
67-- ----------------------  lexical
68
69consLexical :: C.RopCons c
70consLexical med = Right $ relmapLexical med
71
72-- | Create @lexical@ relmap.
73relmapLexical :: C.Intmed c -> C.Relmap c
74relmapLexical med = C.relmapFlow med relkitLexical
75
76-- | Create @lexical@ relkit.
77relkitLexical :: C.RelkitFlow c
78relkitLexical Nothing = Right C.relkitNothing
79relkitLexical (Just he1) = Right kit2 where
80    ns    = D.getTermNames he1
81    lr    = D.shareSide (B.sort ns) ns
82    he2   = D.headMap (D.ssRForward lr) he1
83    kit2  = C.relkitJust he2 $ C.RelkitOneToOne False $ D.ssRForward lr
84
85
86-- ----------------------  order
87
88consOrder :: (Ord c) => C.RopCons c
89consOrder med =
90    do ns <- Op.getOption [] Op.getSignedTerms med "-term"
91       Right $ relmapOrder med ns
92
93-- | Create @order@ relmap.
94relmapOrder :: (Ord c) => C.Intmed c -> [S.SignedTermName] -> C.Relmap c
95relmapOrder med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitOrder
96
97-- | Create @order@ relkit.
98relkitOrder :: (Ord c) => [S.SignedTermName] -> C.RelkitFlow c
99relkitOrder _ Nothing = Right C.relkitNothing
100relkitOrder ns (Just he1) = Right kit2 where
101    kit2  = C.relkitJust he1 $ C.RelkitFull False kitf2
102    kitf2 = D.relBodyOrder ns he1
103
